Detailed Description

template<typename TString>
class GwenUtil::Data::TreeT< TString >

The tree is a simple recursive Name-Value data structure. Each node can have a key, a value and multiple children nodes

Member Function Documentation

template<typename TString >
TreeT< TString > & GwenUtil::Data::TreeT< TString >::AddChild ( )
inline

Adding and setting children. mychild = AddChild(); // adds an unnamed child mychild = AddChild( "Name" ); // adds a named child mychild = SetChild( "Name", "Value" ); // adds a named child with value mychild = GetChild( "Name" ); // returns child, or creates child if not exists bool b = HasChild( "Name" ); // returns true if child exists
